'''Athel Wood''' is obtained by cutting down Athel Tree. It is an item used to craft [[furnishings]]. [[Ajilenakh Nut]]s grow on Athel Trees.

==Locations==
Athel Wood can be found in [[Aaru Village]].

See the '''[https://webstatic-sea.mihoyo.com/app/ys-map-sea/index.html#/map/2?shown_types=450 Teyvat Interactive Map]''' for specific locations.
